rulesStrings.li: physical_description_root->Improvisation and close interplay between instruments, with warm acoustic tones and conversational solos.
physical_description_root->Intimate arrangements and dynamic nuance, balancing meditative pieces and swinging numbers.
r_middle_sentence_1->Improvised solos weave through harmonic frameworks.
r_middle_sentence_2->Rhythmic interplay gives the group a lively push and pull.
r_middle_sentence_3->Brushes and soft comping underwrite delicate solos.
r_middle_sentence_4->Harmonic colors shift with expressive voicings.
r_middle_sentence_5->Soloists trade ideas with conversational fluency.
r_middle_sentence_6->The session feels spontaneous yet carefully attuned.
